about_the_game:
Experience The Pale Beyond’s hand-drawn art inspired by Victorian etchings. The Digital Artbook is a 96 page digital artbook detailing the characters and environments of The Pale Beyond.



Featuring character art, ship design, environment art (and the sled dogs!) by Jess Campbell, Katie Noble, Ethan Mclean and Nadine McLaughlin, the book offers insights on the development and an intimate look at the Temperance and her crew.

To access the art book:

  • Right click The Pale Beyond in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open the Artbook folder
The art book will be downloaded to this Steam folder in PDF format.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong language, & mild references to drug use

detailed_description:
Experience The Pale Beyond’s hand-drawn art inspired by Victorian etchings. The Digital Artbook is a 96 page digital artbook detailing the characters and environments of The Pale Beyond.



Featuring character art, ship design, environment art (and the sled dogs!) by Jess Campbell, Katie Noble, Ethan Mclean and Nadine McLaughlin, the book offers insights on the development and an intimate look at the Temperance and her crew.

To access the art book:

  • Right click The Pale Beyond in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open the Artbook folder
The art book will be downloaded to this Steam folder in PDF format.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 11.0.0 or above
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor (Intel Core i5 and up)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
